name: list_users
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool calltrackingmetrics.
Tool description: Track the performance of your advertising with instantly activated tracking numbers in 30 countries. Integrate with Google and track down to keyword level.
API description: Fetches and returns a list of users associated with a specified account identifier from the RapidAPI service.

aid.description: The account identifier for which the list of users is being fetched.

page.description: The page offset for paginated results. Defaults to None.
